name: DualTransitionBuilder
desc: A transition builder that animates its [child] based on the [AnimationStatus] of the provided [animation].

fields.name: animation
fields.desc: The animation that drives the [child]'s transition.

fields.name: forwardBuilder
fields.desc: A builder for the transition that makes [child] appear on screen.

fields.name: reverseBuilder
fields.desc: A builder for a transition that makes [child] disappear from the screen.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this [DualTransitionBuilder] in the tree.
